title: Terrain rendering does not support shadows and texture blending with Ogre >= 1.11

content.raw:
As discussed  in [#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/3130/change-gazebo-rendering-heightmap-class-to/diff#comment-126229047](#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/3130/change-gazebo-rendering-heightmap-class-to/diff#comment-126229047) , to get Gazebo compiling with Ogre 1.11/1.12 it was necessary to disable some aspects of terrain rendering, including shadows. 

I am not sure if anyone is interested in fixing this, but in any case it is better to track this missing feature in a clear way using a dedicated issue. 

‌
